subject: Unable to run the Junit Tests.
msgSnippet: Hi, I have a class file with all the tests in a suite and the path and classpath are set.The classpath has the . But when I execute the follwoing java
messageBody:
Hi,
I have a class file with all the tests in a suite and the path and
classpath are set.The classpath has the "." But when I execute the
follwoing

java junit.swingui.testRunner Opt.class

or

java Opt,

it says classNotFoundException.
